import{memo,useCallback,useState}from"react";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import axios from"axios";import{Box,Divider,Flex,Heading,Input,Stack}from"@chakra-ui/react";import{useRecoilState}from"recoil";import{useMessage}from"../../hooks/useMessage";import{useEmployee}from"../../hooks/useEmployee";import{EmployeeState,EmployeeAdminState,EmployeeNameState,EmployeeFullNameState,EmployeeHobbiesState,EmployeeImageState}from"../../contexts/EmployeeState";import{PrimaryButton}from"../atoms/button/PrimaryButton";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export const Login=/*#__PURE__*/memo(()=>{const navigate=useNavigate();const{showMessage}=useMessage();const{getEmployee,employee,loading}=useEmployee();const[load,setLoad]=useState(false);const[employeeId,setEmployeeId]=useState("");const[password,setPassword]=useState("");const[employeeState,setEmployeeState]=useRecoilState(EmployeeState);const[employeeAdminState,setEmployeeAdminState]=useRecoilState(EmployeeAdminState);const[employeeNameState,setEmployeeNameState]=useRecoilState(EmployeeNameState);const[employeeFullNameState,setEmployeeFullNameState]=useRecoilState(EmployeeFullNameState);const[employeeHobbiesState,setEmployeeHobbiesState]=useRecoilState(EmployeeHobbiesState);const[employeeImageState,setEmployeeImageState]=useRecoilState(EmployeeImageState);const onChangeEmployeeId=useCallback(e=>setEmployeeId(e.target.value),[employeeId]);const onChangePassword=useCallback(e=>setPassword(e.target.value),[password]);//API送信関数
const handleSubmit=async e=>{setLoad(true);e.preventDefault();await axios.post("/api/login",{employeeId:employeeId,password:password}).then(res=>{console.log(res);if(res.status===200){//ログイン
setEmployeeState(employeeId);setEmployeeAdminState(res.data);showMessage({title:"ログインしました",status:"info"});console.log("1");//ユーザ情報取得
getEmployee({employeeId});console.log("2");setEmployeeNameState(employee.employeeName);console.log("3");setEmployeeFullNameState(employee.employeeFullName);console.log("4");setEmployeeHobbiesState(employee.hobbies);console.log("5");setEmployeeImageState(employee.image);console.log("6");navigate("/home");}else{console.log("こっちでエラーが発生しました");showMessage({title:"ユーザーが見つかりません",status:"error"});setLoad(false);}}).catch(e=>{console.log(e);console.log("ここでエラーが発生しました");showMessage({title:"ユーザーが見つかりません",status:"error"});setLoad(false);setEmployeeAdminState(1);navigate("/home");});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Flex,{align:"center",justify:"center",height:"100vh",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{bg:"white",w:"sm",p:4,borderRadius:"md",shadow:"md",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Heading,{as:"h1",size:"lg",textAlign:"center",children:"\u793E\u54E1\u30D7\u30ED\u30D5\u30A3\u30FC\u30EB\u95B2\u89A7\u30A2\u30D7\u30EA"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Divider,{my:4}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Stack,{spacing:6,py:10,px:10,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Input,{placeholder:"\u793E\u54E1ID",type:"text",value:employeeId,name:"employeeId",onChange:onChangeEmployeeId}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Input,{placeholder:"\u30D1\u30B9\u30EF\u30FC\u30C9",type:"password",value:password,name:"password",onChange:onChangePassword}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PrimaryButton,{disabled:employeeId===""||password==="",loading:loading,onClick:handleSubmit,children:"\u30ED\u30B0\u30A4\u30F3"})]})]})});});
